${modID}:PowerID.NAME: Ultimate Power
DESCRIPTIONS: You are Very Cool and Strong.

${modID}:AwaitingSystemResponsePower.NAME: Awaiting System Response
DESCRIPTIONS: Apply a random #yDEBUFF in #yweak/#yvulnerable/lose 2 #ystrength this turn when attack.

${modID}:BackupDancerPower.NAME: Backup Dancer
DESCRIPTIONS: When attack enemy targets that are in the Weakness Broken state, the Toughness Reduction of this attack will be converted into 1 instance of Super Break DMG.

${modID}:BleakBreedsBlissPower.NAME: Bleak Breeds Bliss
DESCRIPTIONS: When health is under 50%, heal the amount of unblocked damage when attacked.

${modID}:BlissOfOtherworldsEmbracePower.NAME: Bliss Of Otherworld's Embrace
DESCRIPTIONS: Give a %s at the start of turn.

${modID}:BreakPower.NAME: Weak break
DESCRIPTIONS: Attack now!

${modID}:BurdenPower.NAME: Burden
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain 1 energy every 2 attacks. Last for %d turns.

${modID}:CornerstoneDeluxePower.NAME: Cornerstone Deluxe
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain %d block every time you attack.

${modID}:DivineProvisionPower.NAME: Divine Provision
DESCRIPTIONS: Heal %d when play a card.

${modID}:DotVulnerablePower.NAME: Dot Vulnerable
DESCRIPTIONS: Dot damage increase by %.2f

${modID}:DreamdiverPower.NAME: Dreamdiver
DESCRIPTIONS: Choose a card in your discard pile and put it at the top of the draw pile at the start of each turn.

${modID}:FangOfFlareFlayingPower.NAME: Fang Of Flare Flaying
DESCRIPTIONS: Deal %d ${modID}:Follow-Up damage after attack 8 times.

${modID}:FineIwillDoItMyselfPower.NAME: Fine I Will Do It Myself
DESCRIPTIONS: Deal %d ${modID}:Follow-Up damage and ${modID}:Toughness_Reduction %d. when any enemy's health is under half by this damage.

${modID}:FireDotPower.NAME: Fire Dot
DESCRIPTIONS: Deal %d Fire ${modID}:Dot damage at the start of turn.

${modID}:GirlPower.NAME: Girl Power
DESCRIPTIONS: Counter %d when you have block.

${modID}:KarmaPower.NAME: Karma
DESCRIPTIONS: Draw %d card when depleted %d toughness.

${modID}:LightningDotPower.NAME: Lightning Dot
DESCRIPTIONS: Deal %d Lightning ${modID}:Dot damage at the start of turn.

${modID}:LightningLordPower.NAME: Lightning-Lord
DESCRIPTIONS: ${modID}:Lightning-Lord will attack in %d turn. Lightning-Lord can deals %d x %d damage.

${modID}:MatrixOfPresciencePower.NAME: Matrix Of Prescience
DESCRIPTIONS: Damage more than 5 only deal 5 damage.

${modID}:OvertonePower.NAME: Overtone
DESCRIPTIONS: Weakness Break Efficiency increases by 50%.

${modID}:PrayerOfAbyssFlowerPower.NAME: Prayer Of Abyss Flower
DESCRIPTIONS: Heal by the amount of damage when attacked (no more than %d).

${modID}:PromiseNotCommandPower.NAME: Promise Not Command
DESCRIPTIONS: ${modID}:Counter %d.

${modID}:ProofOfDebtPower.NAME: Proof Of Debt
DESCRIPTIONS: Take 50% more ${modID}:Follow-Up damage. Attacked every 3 times, draw a card.

${modID}:QuidProQuoPower.NAME: Quid Pro Quo
DESCRIPTIONS: When energy is less than half, draw %d card when play a non-zero cost card.

${modID}:SlashedDreamPower.NAME: Slashed Dream
DESCRIPTIONS: Increase by 1 when apply a #yDEBUFF to enemy

${modID}:ThanatoplumRebloomPower.NAME: Thanatoplum Rebloom
DESCRIPTIONS: Extend the duration of enemies' Weakness Break.

${modID}:TheShieldPower.NAME: The Shield
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of turn, give enemies %d block. When break block, gain %d block.

${modID}:ToughnessPower.NAME: Toughness
DESCRIPTIONS: When toughness is down to zero, get stunned.

${modID}:ToughnessProtectPower.NAME: Toughness Protect
DESCRIPTIONS: Toughness cannot be damaged

${modID}:TrendOfTheUniversalMarketPower.NAME: Trend Of The Universal Market
DESCRIPTIONS: When attacked, apply %d fire ${modID}:Dot damage.

${modID}:VictoryRushPower.NAME: Victory Rush
DESCRIPTIONS: When an enemy is inflicted with ${modID}:Weakness_Break, deal %d ${modID}:Follow-Up damage and ${modID}:Toughness_Reduction %d.

${modID}:WindDotPower.NAME: Wind Dot
DESCRIPTIONS: Deal %d Wind ${modID}:Dot damage at the start of turn.
